segments.text: The cookie jar is practically calling to the kids, and they can’t resist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach it, and the stool is barely holding him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face—he’s not giving up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just as eager, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just standing in that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring over the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, but she’s part of this too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen when the woman finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
